body.p:
Louisville Ky.
Nov. 14th 1860
Gov. Magoffin
Dear Sir --

Mr Wm M. Duncan of this city will cause to be presented you his petition for releif against a judgment of the city court upon a forfeited recognizance. Although I know nothing of the circumstances attending the case in the city ct. yet I cheerfully bear testimony to the personal excellence of the petitioner. Mr Duncan is a young gentleman who removed to this city from the country. His bearing here has been that of a true gentleman. His means are limited & I trust you will grant him the desired relief.
